page.title: 10A Day in my Life-Sarah.
page.content: Mum brings in my tea at 7.30. I get out of bed and plod about collecting my clothes until Mum shouts at me to hurry up so I get dressed quickly and drink my tea before bounding downstairs to make my toast for breakfast.I burn my toast and have a pear instead. Then I say goodbye to the ponies and Mum drives me and my two sisters to school.It is already hot outside but cooler in the classroom where we do Maths and after play ,English. After lunch we have a long playtime then we go in for quiet reading and another lesson before we have swimming.It is delicious in the pool. We swim and dive and play then get out to dry in the sun.We have a story and its time to go home.After tea I groom my pony,play for a while,watch TV or read until it's bedtime.
